Invocation Name: mountain troll
des:
Listen to this story with a timeless lesson. 
Happiness was a mountain troll living in a distant mountain, in a story, a must have in your bag of stories is the Urban Mindset, of the premature optimization and debt, a life of banishment from nature, debt, pain , depression and suffering, are you one of these two children, find out in this story...
At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the skill. This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
